## Data Issue Type

- [ ] Incorrect LGA
- [ ] Incorrect town
- [ ] Incorrect coordinates
- [ ] Incorrect postal code
- [ ] Incorrect population
- [ ] Incorrect capital
- [ ] Incorrect senatorial district
- [ ] Incorrect geopolitical zone
- [ ] Other (specify below)

## State Affected

Which state has the incorrect data?

## Data Source

Please provide a reliable source for the correction:

- **Source Name:** [e.g. National Bureau of Statistics, Official State Website]
- **URL:** [link to source]
- **Date Accessed:** [when you verified this information]

## Additional Details

Any additional context about the data correction.

## Impact

How does this incorrect data affect users?

- [ ] Critical - Causes errors
- [ ] High - Misleading information
- [ ] Medium - Minor inaccuracy
- [ ] Low - Cosmetic issue
